justification: XSS can lead to significant data theft and user impersonation, affecting many users. It is moderately easy to reproduce and exploit.
recommendations: Implement input validation and output encoding.; Use Content Security Policy (CSP) to mitigate XSS risks.

justification: SQL Injection can lead to unauthorized access to sensitive data and is relatively easy to exploit if input validation is not enforced.
recommendations: Use prepared statements and parameterized queries.; Regularly audit and test for SQL injection vulnerabilities.

justification: IDOR can lead to unauthorized access to user data, but it requires specific knowledge of object identifiers.
recommendations: Implement strict access controls and validation for object references.; Conduct regular security reviews of access controls.

justification: Weak authentication can lead to significant unauthorized access, affecting many users. It is moderately easy to exploit.
recommendations: Implement multi-factor authentication.; Regularly review and strengthen authentication policies.

threat_title: Data Exposure due to Misconfigured Security Settings
justification: Misconfigurations can lead to severe data exposure, affecting many users. The exploitability is moderate but can be widespread.
recommendations: Regularly audit security configurations.; Implement automated configuration management tools.

justification: DoS attacks can disrupt service for all users, causing significant impact. They are moderately easy to execute.
recommendations: Implement DDoS protection services.; Use rate limiting and traffic filtering.

justification: Insecure APIs can lead to unauthorized access to sensitive operations, affecting many users. Exploitation is moderate.
recommendations: Ensure all API endpoints have proper authentication and authorization checks.; Conduct regular security testing on APIs.

justification: Improper input validation can lead to various attacks, affecting many users. The exploitability is moderate.
recommendations: Implement strict input validation across all user inputs.; Conduct regular security training for developers.
